sync.title: Cloud Sync
sync.description: Connect Google Drive to keep your projects in sync across devices.
sync.clientIdHint: Required for Google sign-in. Stored only on this device.
sync.clientIdHiddenHint: We keep this hidden for simplicity.
sync.passphraseHint: Your passphrase encrypts data before it leaves this device.
sync.rememberHint: Stores the passphrase locally on this device.
sync.promptDontShowHint: Hide this login prompt when the app opens.

errors.passphraseRequired: Passphrase is required to enable sync.
errors.missingClientId: Google client ID is missing. Add it above to continue.
errors.oauthFailed: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.
errors.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups and try again.
errors.syncFailed: Sync failed. Check your connection and try again.
errors.redirectUriMismatch: Redirect URI mismatch. Make sure oauth-callback.html is allowed.
errors.invalidGrant: Authorization code expired or invalid. Try again.
errors.tokenExpired: Session expired. Please connect to Google Drive again.

sync.pullDescription: Checking Google Drive and applying the latest changes.
sync.bulkDescription: Fetching and applying your cloud data.

dashboard.welcomeText: Pojdme si dat kratkou prohlidku pro rychly start. Po ni uvidite nastaveni cloud synchronizace.
dashboard.createText: Kliknete sem pro vytvoreni noveho projektu. Projekty pomahaji organizovat vase dialogy.
dashboard.searchText: Pouzijte vyhledavani pro rychle nalezeni projektu a dialogu.
dashboard.communityText: Projekt muzete podporit, pripojit se na Discord a pouzivat integraci pro Unreal Engine.

editor.welcomeText: Learn how to create interactive dialogues.
editor.nodeToolbarText: Drag these nodes onto the canvas to build your conversation flow.
editor.canvasText: This is where you'll build your dialogue tree. Connect nodes to create conversation paths.
editor.saveText: Don't forget to save! Your changes are stored locally.

supportConfirm.title: Otevrit podporu na Discordu?
supportConfirm.description: Po kliknuti na Ano budete presmerovani na Discord server.

paragraphs.1: Pouzivanim teto aplikace souhlasite s jeji pouzivanim v souladu s platnymi zakony a temito podminkami.
paragraphs.2: Odpovidate za spravnost a zakonitost obsahu, ktery v tomto nastroji vytvarite, importujete nebo exportujete.
paragraphs.3: Software je poskytovan tak jak je, bez zaruk jakehokoli druhu. Pouzivate jej na vlastni riziko.
paragraphs.4: Podpora je poskytovana pouze na bazi best effort. Neexistuje smluvni narok na podporu, cas reakce ani vyreseni problemu.
paragraphs.5: Pro komunitni podporu pouzijte Discord server:
paragraphs.6: Tyto podminky muzeme casem aktualizovat. Pokracovanim v pouzivani aplikace souhlasite s aktualizovanymi podminkami.
paragraphs.7: Pokud s temito podminkami nesouhlasite, prestante aplikaci pouzivat.

paragraphs.1: Tato aplikace uklada data projektu primarne lokalne v ulozisti prohlizece nebo zarizeni.
paragraphs.2: Po zapnuti volitelne synchronizace mohou byt data prenesena do nakonfigurovanych ulozist tretich stran.
paragraphs.3: Vy urcujete, jake informace jsou zadany, exportovany a synchronizovany. Citliva data ukladejte pouze s odpovidajicim zabezpecenim.
paragraphs.4: Doporucujeme pouzivat bezpecna zarizeni, ochranu uctu a sifrovani, kde je dostupne.
paragraphs.5: Pokracovanim v pouzivani teto aplikace berete tento model zpracovani dat na vedomi.
